game.name: Genetica: Extinction
game.genres: 인디, 전략, 무료 플레이, 앞서 해보기
game.shortDescription: Your goal is simple - prevent total extinction. The ecosystem reacts to every decision you make. Hunger, predators, and climate shifts will constantly test the limits of evolution.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your goal is simple - prevent total extinction. The ecosystem reacts to every decision you make. Hunger, predators, and climate shifts will constantly test the limits of evolution.
